name: Maha (Itai Valach, ShaiDayan)
description:
As the Hindu goddess Mahadevi you need to gift blessings given to you from the mortal plane. Match your hands according to the prayer on the corresponding side. As you complete more prayers, you will gain more hands, making the blessings harder to grant.

Compete against another player, each controlling one side of Mahadevi, the one to answer more prayers in a set time without missing is the brightest side of the Great Mother.
